Barack Obama !( CNN)-- President Bush Secretary of State Colin Powell announced Sunday that he will be voting for Barack Obama , citing the Democrat's "ability to inspire" and the "inclusive nature of his campaign." I think he is a transformational figure, he is a new generation coming onto the world stage, onto the American stage, and for that reason I'll be voting for Barack Obama , Colin Powell said on NBC's "Meet the Press." Google Inc. . Chief Executive Officer Eric Schmidt . Photographer: Tony Avelar/Bloomberg Eric Schmidt said he is "committed to Google Inc. " and that he agrees with co-founders Sergey Brin on "everything." He said he will stay at Google Inc. as long as it is exciting. Eric Schmidt spoke to reporters in Munich today. Eric Schmidt , who will be replaced as CEO by Page on April 4, said the transition will not affect decision-making at the company.

Google may be returning to its start-up roots. "A lot of the growth of the company used to be driven by innovation," said Yun Kim, an analyst at investment firm Gleacher& Co. Having someone with the very strong product background that Larry has could bring some innovation back to Google. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain as executive chairman and will advise Page and Sergey Brin , Google's other co-founder. Sergey Brin will give up his title as co-president to work on high-priority projects. One
